roleset.name: to hold back, holding back/down
roleset.note: REPRESS-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls concealment-16, subjugate-42.3. (from repress.01-v)
REPRESSION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT, repress.01. Corresponds to VNcls concealment-16, subjugate-42.3. (from repression.01-n)

role.descr: domain in which arg1 is being repressed

example.name: gerund
example.text: The sole sympathetic character is the prodigal daughter Kate ( Jaclyn Smith ) , and she is tolerable only by virtue of having nothing in common with her kinfolk , a truly benighted pack of Southern Protestants whose grim existence consists mostly of [*PRO*] growing peaches and repressing sex .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Even as blacks escaped the political and economic repression of the South to enter the industrial workforce of the North, they were met with racial hostility.
